plan_comparison.chart.custom_permissions.string: Create invite-only spaces for your team to work privately.

plan_comparison.chart.audio_conversation.string: Use audio to talk with your collaborators directly in a Figma or FigJam file.

plan_comparison.chart.security.details.string: Set up SAML single sign-on with your existing identity management system; enforce SSO for all team members and manage provisioning via SCIM.

plan_comparison.chart.design_system_anal.string: View usage metrics to track adoption, measure impact, and more effectively maintain your design system.

plan_comparison.chart.custom_templates.d.string: Make your own templates and share them with your organization.

plan_comparison.chart.unified_admin_and_.string: Bring multiple teams together under one central Figma account; manage users and billing in one place.

plan_comparison.chart.branching_and_merg.string: Work in a separate branch and merge changes to the main file when you are ready.

plan_comparison.chart.single_sign_on.det.string: Set up SAML single sign-on with your existing identity management system; enforce SSO for all team members and manage provisioning via SCIM.

plan_comparison.chart.workspaces.details.string: Organize users and content into multiple, focused workspaces that mirror how your organization is structured.

plan_comparison.chart.guest_access_contr.string: Limit the ability for external collaborators to join your organization.

plan_comparison.chart.onboarding.details.string: Work hand in hand with the Figma team to plan and execute a successful Figma rollout.

plan_comparison.chart.advanced_prototypi.string: Create more realistic prototypes with expressions, conditional logic, and more.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode.advanced_.string: Get measurements, specs, layouts, and production-ready code—all in a single click.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode.codegen_l.string: Customize code output with alternative dimension units and plugins.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode.annotatio.string: Mark elements as “Ready for dev” and add redlines and notes.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode.compare_c.string: Compare different versions of a frame to quickly see what’s changed.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode.plugins_a.string: Build and run plugins to customize Dev Mode workflows and codegen.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode.private_p.string: Build your own private plugins to fully customize the Inspect panel for your team or organization.

plan_comparison.chart.dev_mode.details.string: Dev Mode is a new space in Figma for developers with features that help you translate designs into code, faster.

plan_comparison.chart.video_in_prototype.string: Add videos to prototypes for richer, more realistic experiences.

plan_comparison.chart.project_transfer.d.string: Transfer a whole project to someone on the Organization or Enterprise plan.

plan_comparison.chart.project_and_team_t.string: Transfer a whole team or project to someone on the Organization or Enterprise plan.

plan_comparison.chart.private_projects.d.string: Create invite-only spaces for your team to work privately.

plan_comparison.chart.prototype_sharing_.string: Share prototypes with anyone—without sharing their underlying design file.

plan_comparison.chart.design_system_mode.string: Create themes by switching between different variable values (like dark mode).
